title: 求大神帮忙
author: 阿布测测吧
txt_content:
我进单人游戏一下之后就提示这个：





然后就会从多人游戏的界面退出来：



这是崩溃报告：
[15:42:07] [Client thread/INFO]: [CHAT] Damage Indicators was unable to check for updates!
[15:42:07] [Netty Client IO #0/INFO] [THAUMCRAFT]: Restoring client configs.
[15:42:07] [Netty Client IO #0/INFO] [simplyjetpacks]: Loading configuration files
[15:42:07] [Server thread/INFO]: Fallen_Crazy lost connection: TextComponent{text='Disconnected', siblings=[], style=Style{hasParent=false, color=null, bold=null, italic=null, underlined=null, obfuscated=null, clickEvent=null, hoverEvent=null}}
[15:42:07] [Server thread/INFO]: Fallen_Crazy 退出了游戏
[15:42:07] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping singleplayer server as player logged out
[15:42:08] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[15:42:08] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving players
[15:42:08] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving worlds
[15:42:08] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Overworld
[15:42:09] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Nether
[15:42:09] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/The End
[15:42:09] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Underdark
[15:42:09] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/The Outer Lands
[15:42:09] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Bedrock
[15:42:10] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/The Last Millenium
[15:42:10] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/Twilight Forest
[15:42:10] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level '新的世界'/SpectreWorld
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 0
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension -1
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 1
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension -100
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension -42
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension -19
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension -112
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 7
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 2
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Applying holder lookups
[15:42:42] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Holder lookups applied


如果要更详情的崩溃报告就告诉我

求大神帮忙

replies.author: 小叶工作室
replies.txt_content: 现在楼主你问题已私下解决，是不是该把金粒给我了

replies.txt_content:
